summary: This bill, the Second Chance Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize and improve the Second Chance Act of 2007. It focuses on several key areas, including state and local reentry programs (expanding to include substance use disorder treatment and reentry housing services), family-based substance abuse treatment grants, educational methods in correctional facilities, career training grants, and community-based mentoring services. The bill updates funding authorization periods to the years 2026-2030 across various programs.
